index.name: Flux
index.short_description: Performance Improvements for LabyMod
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: OptiFine
index.short_description: OptiFine allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for HD textures and many configuration options
index.author: sp614x (LabyMod)

index.name: VoiceChat
index.short_description: Totally free in-game voice chat for Minecraft with 3D surround sound. Play together like never before!
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: Full Bright
index.short_description: Allows you to change the brightness of the game to full brightness.
index.author: BurgerbudeORG

index.name: Spotify
index.short_description: Show your current playing spotify track right in your HUD.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: BetterPerspective
index.short_description: Navigate freely around you in the third person view without changing the movement direction.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: CustomNameTags
index.short_description: Give your friends custom name tags so that they will stand out in every crowd
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: DamageIndicator
index.short_description: This addon displays the health of all players that are nearby.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: FriendTags
index.short_description: See a name tag above the heads of your Labychat friends.
index.author: Crazy

index.name: Badges
index.short_description: Show Badges from Laby.net above a player head
index.author: Crazy

index.name: ToggleSneak
index.short_description: ToggleSneak allows you to toggle sneak and sprint. When ToggleSneak is active, you can press the sneak button to turn sneaking on/off.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: KeyStrokes
index.short_description: Display your keyboard individually as hud widget
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: Resourcepacks24
index.short_description: The biggest resource pack portal in terms of texture packs with 12,000+ fantastic resource packs!
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: HDSkins
index.short_description: Upload your own HD Skin for your player! Everyone with this addon can see it. Support: discord.HDSkins.de  Privacy Policies: https://privacy.hdskins.de
index.author: LabyOne

index.name: CustomCrosshair
index.short_description: Change the style of your crosshair!
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: ChatTime
index.short_description: Display the current time in front of every message in chat.
index.author: JumpingPxl

index.name: ItemPhysics
index.short_description: Items and blocks will rotate around their axis while they are flying.
index.author: CreativeMD (LabyMod)

index.name: Chat Utilities
index.short_description: Chat Utilities provides an enchanted experience with the Minecraft chat through an easy interface.
index.author: Fesa

index.name: TeamSpeak
index.short_description: Connects Minecraft with TeamSpeak 3 and shows you all clients in your current channel.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: CustomBlockOverlay
index.short_description: Create an individualized outline and overlay of the currently focused block.
index.author: LabyMod

index.name: HyPlus
index.short_description: Hypixel server support.
index.author: Antimoxs

index.name: AutoReconnect
index.short_description: Automatically reconnects to the server you got disconnected from
index.author: JumpingPxl

index.name: Send To Server
index.short_description: Easy to use; command based way to switch between servers. '/ssahelp' for more information.
index.author: DoJapHD

index.name: ChatLog
index.short_description: Stores all messages and uploads a specific count to the ChatLog server. /lcl {amount}
index.author: LabyOne

index.name: NoBob
index.short_description: Adds the option for a more decent bobbing animation
index.author: JumpingPxl

index.name: DirectionHud
index.short_description: DirectionHud Addon which display's an Compass
index.author: Zeichenfolge
